Description: Production-grade multi-tier infrastructure with VPC, NLB, Auto Scaling, RDS, and S3

ProjectName.Description: Project name for resource naming and tagging

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Suffix for resource names to support multiple parallel deployments
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens

AutoScalingMinSize.Description: Minimum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

AutoScalingMaxSize.Description: Maximum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

AutoScalingDesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

SourceAmiIdSsmParameter.Description: SSM parameter name holding the AMI ID (keeps template free of hard-coded AMI IDs)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Network Load Balancer

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash # Run as root and set up logging exec > >(tee /var/log/user-data.log|logger -t user-data -s 2>/dev/console) 2>&1 echo "==========================================" echo "UserData script started at: $(date)" echo "Running as user: $(whoami)" echo "==========================================" # Update system echo "Updating system packages..." yum update -y # Install httpd instead of nginx for better compatibility echo "Installing httpd (Apache)..." yum install -y httpd # Enable and start httpd echo "Starting httpd service..." systemctl enable httpd systemctl start httpd # Verify httpd is running echo "Checking httpd status:" systemctl status httpd # Create a simple test page echo "Creating test HTML page..." echo "

Hello from $(hostname -f)

" > /var/www/html/index.html echo "

Server running on Amazon Linux 2

" >> /var/www/html/index.html echo "

Instance ID: $(curl -s http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id)

" >> /var/www/html/index.html echo "

Server Time: $(date)

" >> /var/www/html/index.html # Set proper permissions chown apache:apache /var/www/html/index.html chmod 644 /var/www/html/index.html # Verify services are running echo "Final verification:" systemctl is-active httpd netstat -tlnp | grep :80 echo "==========================================" echo "UserData script completed at: $(date)" echo "=========================================="

NLBHostedZoneId.Description: Network Load Balancer Hosted Zone ID

NLBSecurityGroupId.Description: Network Load Balancer Security Group ID

NLBTargetGroupArn.Description: Network Load Balancer Target Group ARN

VPCFlowLogRoleArn.Description: VPC Flow Log IAM Role ARN
